output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint arbitrary amounts of tokens to any user account, causing a denial of service to the token holders.

The transfer function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a user to transfer any arbitrary amount of tokens to any address, causing a denial of service to the token holders.

The transferFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a user to transfer any arbitrary amount of tokens to any address, causing a denial of service to the token holders.
The buy function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the buyer's balance, allowing a user to buy any arbitrary amount of tokens, causing a denial of service to the buyer.
The sell function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the contract's balance, allowing a user to sell any arbitrary amount of tokens, causing a denial of service to the seller.
